channel.title: Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 Service Pack 2 [Can I remove it?]
channel.description:
Well, I currently have the Framework 2.0 Service Pack 2, and I also have the Framework 3.0 Service Pack 2.
I was wondering if I can remove the 2.0 one, as it is 535MB (This computer sucks). Here is a picture...
[img]http://i119.photobucket.com/albums/o129/daggerheart8/12345.jpg[/img]

item.title: Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 Service Pack 2 [Can I remove it?]
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

You can. 2.0 execuatables are binary compatible with 3.5.

Read full topic
